name: 江怡君
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。

scorePolicy:
以下說明如有任何疑義或未說明周全之處，授課教師擁有最終及惟一解釋權。

Average of Weekly Quizzes * 30% (每週小考)
Mid-term Exam * 35% (期中考)
Final Exam * 35% (期末考)

(作業) Students are required to do homework. The instructor will check students’ notes and homework at irregular intervals. If a student is found to not have done the preview or homework, 20 points will be deducted from his or her quiz that week.

(小考和補考) Quizzes are always administered at the beginning of the class. Late students can ask for make-up quizzes administered by the teaching assistant, but 20 points will be automatically deducted. An absent student cannot ask for a make-up quiz. Yet, for all students, one lowest quiz grade needs not to be factored into the average calculation.

(實際報考) Students who do take BULATS Standard Test within the semester will be awarded extra 5 points to their final grade. 

(小老師) Teaching assistant will be awarded 3 bonus points to his or her final grade. 

(作弊) Any student caught cheating in quizzes and exams will be given a zero for his or her final grade without any room of negotiation.
